doc.title: The Final Journey
doc.plot: The Final Journey traces the rail lines that ultimately delivered millions of innocent people from every corner of Europe to the door-step to the various Nazi concentration and death camps. By weaving a special collection of rare photographs and archival film together with current of the each site today the program chronicles the history, perpetrators and the victims who suffered and died at each location. Visits include infamous locations such as Dachau, Sachsenhausen, Flossenbuerg, Bergen-Belsen, Neuengamme, Ravensbriek, Stutthof, Mauthausen, Chlemno, Treblinka, Majdanek and Auschwitz-Birkenau.
